songs.title: Summertime Anthem
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Rewind July last summer
I saw Santa Jumping through my sprinkler
Rudolph, Jack Frost, & Reindeer
Opened up a lemonade stand on my corner
2 cups for a dollar

[Chorus]
Open up your eyes
Crazy summertime
No words you'll find
Upside down the weather man says snow
But its burning up outside
Its always summertime

[Verse 2]
Push play
Today, I saw my girlfriend
At the beach, putting sunscreen on a penguin
Just when I thought it couldn't get weirder
I saw the grinch at the boardwalk with my teacher


[Chorus]


Always summertime
Always summertime

[Verse 3]
My teachers with the Grinch
Crazy summertime
And saint nick is getting drenched
Always summertime
And now Rudolph's getting hitched
Crazy summertime


All elves are in Hawaii


[Chorus]
Open up your eyes
Crazy summertime
No words you'll find
Upside down the weather man says snow
But it's burning up outside
Its always summertime
Open up your eyes
Crazy summertime
No words you'll find
Upside down the weather man says snow
But it's burning up outside
Its always summertime
